title: new masteries
body: any one else feel like, in their attempt to make the masteries more unique, they actually made them far more generic? Now there are literally fewer choices. it seems to me that there will be one mastery page for each position as opposed to each champion. Yes, you might swap out AP for AD, but the page will be essentially the same. day 2 and not a fan. Also, ADC top has been a thing in %60 of games i've played yesterday and today.
